full_summary:
========

### Tender Announcement
#### Leasing of 55 Portable Two-Way Digital Radios & associated requirements

[Ref.] [CIC-156855] / [[Amendment]] [3]

**Division:** [Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada]
**Address:** 70 Crémazie St, Gatineau, QC K1A 1L1, Canada

* **Period:** 4 years, including options
* **Commodity:** Portable two-way digital radios; associated accessories; unlimited airtime; and 24/7 technical support
* **Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)

[Pre]: [NO478]

**Read this notice carefully before making an inquiry or preparing your response.**

Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) seeks to procure fifty-five (55) portable two-way digital radios, associated accessories, unlimited airtime, and 24/7 technical support for four years (including options). This equipment will enable effective communication between security personnel in the National Capital Region (NCR). IRCC aims to upgrade its aged communication system to enhance security coordination and emergency response capabilities.

**Important milestones:**

* **Closing Date:** 18 September 2023 (15:00:00)
* **Conference/Site Visit:** 23 August 2023
* **Bid Opening:** 18 September 2023 (15:00:00)
* **Contract Start Date:** 01 December 2023
* **Contract End Date:** 30 November 2027

**Compliance requirements:**

All bidders must:

1. Provide relevant documentation for each purchase option.
2. Adhere to Canada's assessment and audit regulations.
3. Conduct an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) for any operations or installation.

To download the complete tender package, visit:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8018/rfp-cic-156855---english_0.pdf
or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8018/qa-round-2---rfp---cic-156855_0.pdf

**To participate in the RFP process:**

1. Review the attached notice and proceed to the website indicated above for tender details.
2. Obtain a printed or electronic copy of the tender document by visiting the above-mentioned website.
3. Respond with your tender prior to the published closing date of 18 September 202
